DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare new daily disposable , silicone hydrogel contact lens market daily disposable , silicone hydrogel contact lenses .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Evaluation New Daily Disposable Silicone Hydrogel Lens
DOC.detailed_description: Part 1 study involve bilateral wear three different type market contact lens . Each type lens worn three consecutive day daily disposable wear . Participants previously identify symptomatic lens wearer asymptomatic lens wearer , base upon response screen questionnaire . Participants wear lens type long comfortable day , lenses remove sleep . After completion Part 1 , participant begin Part 2 , include dispense investigational study lens one week bilateral wear , single follow-up visit end period .
DOC.criteria: 17 year age ; full legal capacity volunteer . Ocular examination within last two year Correctable visual acuity 20/30 better ( eye ) habitual vision correction . Currently wear soft contact lens . Clear cornea ; active ocular disease . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Currently wear 1DAY ACUVUE TruEye Sauflon Clariti 1DAY contact lens . Monovision . Any ocular disease . Never wear contact lens . Corneal refractive surgery . Uses topical ocular medicine . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
